holidays.title: Culture Freedom Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the free culture movement this Culture Freedom Day.

holidays.title: Drawing Day
holidays.description: Get out your drawing pads and pencils and bring the images in your imagination to life.

holidays.title: International Day of Light
holidays.description: Today, let’s come together to celebrate the life-giving light and its role in our lives.

holidays.title: International Heritage Breeds Day
holidays.description: On International Heritage Breeds Day, let’s protect rare and farm animal breeds from extinction.

holidays.title: National BBQ Day
holidays.description: Are you ready to get grilling? Here’s how you can celebrate National BBQ Day.

holidays.title: National Biographer's Day
holidays.description: Get your nerd mode on as we honor a popular branch of literature.

holidays.title: National Coquilles Saint Jacques Day
holidays.description: It’s time to come out of your ‘shell’ as we celebrate a lip-smacking French seafood delicacy.

holidays.title: National Do Something Good for Your Neighbor Day
holidays.description: A neighbor is not merely the person who lives closest to you.

holidays.title: National Honor Our LGBT Elders Day
holidays.description: A time to pay tribute to those who have paved the way for the LGBT community.

holidays.title: National Learn to Swim Day
holidays.description: When in the water, safety first! Discover the importance of learning how to swim.

holidays.title: National Love a Tree Day
holidays.description: Let’s set a moment aside to appreciate the wonderful gifts of trees.

holidays.title: National Piercing Day
holidays.description: A fun observance that focuses on the art of piercings and its intriguing history.

holidays.title: National River Cleanup Day
holidays.description: Let's clean up our neighborhoods and local natural places this National River Cleanup Day.

holidays.title: National Sea Monkey Day
holidays.description: We celebrate the existence of these strangely alluring shrimp.

holidays.title: Nickel Day
holidays.description: Let's work together to educate people about the benefits and drawbacks of the transitional metal, nickel.

holidays.title: Plant a Lemon Tree Day
holidays.description: Plant a Lemon Tree Day celebrates the goodness of lemon trees around the world.

holidays.title: Preakness Stakes
holidays.description: Come one, come all, for one of the best horse racing events of them all!

holidays.title: Ride a Unicycle Day
holidays.description: Ride a Unicycle Day takes place annually to appreciate the fun one-wheeled vehicle.

holidays.title: Savitri Amavasya
holidays.description: Get informed about the rituals and traditions of this festival with our great information and tips.

holidays.title: Waiters Day
holidays.description: National Waiters’ Day is a national campaign that celebrates the food and service industry workers.

holidays.title: Wear Purple for Peace Day
holidays.description: Let’s wear purple to show that we all long for peace and will always do so.

holidays.title: World Fiddle Day
holidays.description: Everyone get your bows, it’s World Fiddle Day, so let’s go a-fiddling on this day!

holidays.title: World Whiskey Day
holidays.description: Whisky is a historical classic that’s been distilled with care for over 500 years.

holidays.title: Grayson Chrisley’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality personality is gaining traction on television and is set to become a rising star.

holidays.title: IU’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented artist is on the rise and nothing can stand in her way.

holidays.title: Janet Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This powerhouse singer and songwriter is a global star that never stopped rising.

holidays.title: Megan Fox’s Birthday
holidays.description: This stunning megastar is a hit in Hollywood and she has no intention of stopping.

holidays.title: Tori Spelling’s Birthday
holidays.description: She nurtured her career to become the globally celebrated actress and author she is today.
